Food

Food items in Remixed Dungeon satisfy hunger and keep the hero in good health. Without food, the hero will become hungry, weak, and eventually start losing health.

Food Types

  • Iron Ration - Standard food item that fully satisfies hunger
  • Overpriced Ration - Expensive food from shops, smaller effect
  • Rotten Food - Dangerous food that poisons the hero
  • Rotten Ration - Rotten version of Iron Ration
  • Frozen Carpaccio - Special food that heals and cures status effects
  • Mystery Meat - Food with random effects (good or bad)
  • Chargrilled Meat - Cooked meat from cooking Mystery Meat
  • Food - The generic food item

Hunger Mechanics

  • Eating food fully satisfies hunger
  • Each food item provides 3000 hunger points (satiety)
  • Without food, hunger increases until the hero starts losing health
  • Hunger system details

Strategy

  • Always carry at least 2-3 food items when entering the dungeon
  • Ration food carefully in longer levels
  • Frozen Carpaccio is valuable for its healing effects
  • Mystery Meat can be cooked at a cauldron to make safe food

Availability

  • Found in stores and special rooms
  • Sometimes dropped by enemies
  • Created through cooking Mystery Meat

Related

  • Hunger - Detailed hunger mechanics
  • Iron Ration - Primary food item
  • Items - All items in the game
  • Shops - Where food can be purchased

Content Verification

  • Information source: Food implementations in Remixed Dungeon
  • All food effects verified against actual game code
